title: PaPaRoGuesAlpha Build Dos Box Front End and 35 games
description:
This is the alpha phase of a new dosbox frontend i am coding.
I hope you enjoy it. 

also 35 old DOS games to show how the frontend works 

(1989) Bandit Kings of Ancient China - KOEI
